mock_detection.description: No mock data detected in implementation
mock_detection.evidence: All test cases use real detector objects and real computation. No type() mocks or hardcoded test data.

placeholder_detection.description: No placeholder functions or TODO comments
placeholder_detection.evidence: All methods are fully implemented with real logic. No stub implementations or TODOs.

code_duplication.evidence: Detection methods (_analyze_drift, _analyze_error_loop, etc.) follow consistent pattern without duplication.

test_coverage.evidence: 28 test cases covering: construction, aggregation, escalation, debouncing, serialization, edge cases. All 1303 tests passing.

type_safety.description: Type hints are complete and correct
type_safety.evidence: All methods have proper type annotations. Return types and parameter types specified throughout.

documentation.description: Module and class docstrings are comprehensive
documentation.evidence: Module docstring, class docstrings, method docstrings all present and detailed. Design decisions documented.

dead_code_analysis.evidence: All methods called from main entry point (aggregate_and_respond). All helper methods (_analyze_*, _record_detection, etc.) used.

integration_check.evidence: All imports (detection reports, dataclasses, datetime) available and working. Exports added to __init__.py correctly.

summary: All validation checks passed. InterventionManager implementation is production-ready with zero issues detected. Real code, no mocks, comprehensive tests, full documentation.
